mdRecord.dcterms:description: This black and white photograph shows a family group posed next to a fireplace in Blandome. The handwritten notes on the back read, "1957, Clarence, Bette Jo, Eddie, Father, Bette Marie, Mother with Cynthia." Notes in a different hand indicate that "Father" is Clarence and "Mother" is Nannie.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Clarence M. Wood and Family at Blandome, 1957 (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Photographs
Wood, Clarence M. (Clarence Mosby), Sr.
Wood, Nannie Elizabeth Walker
Blandome (Lexington, Va.)
